        public void updateCountryPaneInfo(java.lang.String countryName,
                                  java.lang.String playerColor,
                                  java.lang.String continentColor,
                                  int armiesNumber)
        Receive new labels' info, update them Called by CountryView for updating labels' info TODO: need to be refactor
        参数:
        countryName - new country name
        playerColor - current owner color
        continentColor - continent color
        armiesNumber - current armies left on this country
